tweet_text:
“Worldbuilding is not plot.”

I’m not even a writer and this sentence hurts to read. Tolkien’s worldbuilding made LOTR the vast thought and idea-provoking force that it is. It captures imaginations.

Chuck is essentially a ‘writer’ openly admitting to not understand the medium.
